description:
Main character of Xabungle. Jiron is a young man who witnessed his parents` murder at the hands of a breaker named Timp Sharon and swears revenge. Seeking to steal a Walker Machine, the Xabungle, he teams up with the Sand Rats group of bandits and is able to do so. Very headstrong, he ignores the "three day rule" imposed by the Innocent and makes multiple attempts to defeat Timp, often with disastrous results.
Over the course of the series Jiron is one of the Iron Gear`s most accomplished Walker Machine pilots and mid-way through the series he upgrades to the Gallier. He later becomes leader of the Solt organization rebelling against the Innocent.
Jiron is very dedicated to Elchi and attempts numerous times to rescue her following her capture by the Innocent, despite his allies disagreeing with him.
name: Jiron Amos
